thread.section_title: iQ Hotel Roma - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Could not fault it. Great place to stay. Well done IQ
thread.title_full: Could not fault it. Great place to stay. Well done IQ - Review of iQ Hotel Roma, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Jane N
title: Could not fault it. Great place to stay. Well done IQ
text:
I have stayed in many hotels in Rome over the last 30 years, always going for what appeared to be an authentic period style hotel in a beautiful building, and for the most part, these hotels were fine in their way, but always found the decor or furniture somewhat dated and worn.
If you want a modern hotel that is situated in a quite street but close to everything, comfy beds, great bathroom and tastefully decorated, then look no further.
I must say that I was sceptical of their 'vending machine' innovation, but found it really useful, especially the ice machine.
Around the corner from the train station but in a nice part of town. Lovely roof garden and polite, helpful staff.
I particularly liked the little notes left around the room that were informative, friendly and polite.
Last thing to say was that the room was exceptionally clean and TV was of a high quality. Great picture.
Would definitely stay here again.
